/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their bare branches reaching out to the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image is taken from a low angle, adding depth and perspective to the scene.
